test_scenarios.name: P0: New User Registration
steps: Enter valid business information (company name, email, industry, etc.)
test_scenarios.expected_result: User successfully registered and redirected to Brex dashboard or initial onboarding.

test_scenarios.name: P0: Existing User Login
steps: Enter valid email address and password
test_scenarios.expected_result: User successfully logs in and is redirected to Brex dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: P0: Simulate Brex Card Transaction
steps: Identify a card and ensure it is active.
Assume a transaction has been initiated using the Brex card (no actual transaction will be made)
test_scenarios.expected_result: The transaction is registered and visible in the user's transaction history.
